definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Please call Mr. Bickford down from the ladder to wash his hands.
sentences.chinese: 请把比克佛德先生从梯子上叫下来洗洗手。

sentences.english: Facer fell off the ladder and skinned his knees.
sentences.chinese: 费塞从梯子上跌下来，膝盖破皮了。

sentences.english: The ladder will be more secure here.
Never use ladders on a wet floor.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要在湿地板上使用梯子。

sentences.english: A man with a cap was on a ladder, cleaning the wall.
sentences.chinese: 一个戴帽子的人站在梯子上刷墙。

sentences.english: Portable metal or aluminium ladders should be equipped with non-skid feet.
sentences.chinese: 金属或铝制的轻便梯子应当装防滑凳。

sentences.english: Li Qing and Jane are climbing a ladder.
I fell off the ladder and hurt my left arm.
sentences.chinese: 我从梯子上掉了下来，伤了左胳膊。

sentences.english: Farrell calls it his stairway to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 法雷尔把它称为他登上天堂的梯子。

sentences.english: In his mind, hard work was a ladder to success.
sentences.chinese: 在他的思想里，勤奋工作是通往成功的梯子。

sentences.english: I took off my shoes and hung my clothes on the stepladder.
sentences.chinese: 我脱下鞋子，把衣服挂在梯子上。

sentences.english: It keeps the pressure of a ladder-round.
sentences.chinese: 仍感受著梯子横木的压力。

sentences.english: Each ball into the basket , Pa Tizi the ball out to be re - started race.
sentences.chinese: 每次投球进篮后，要爬梯子将球取出再重新开始比赛。

sentences.english: Now dig out the left two columns until you connect to the ladder-eye.
sentences.chinese: 然后挖通左侧两个柱子，直到连接到梯子形成的眼睛。

sentences.english: You can climb up and down a ladder.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用梯子爬上爬下。

definition: to put up scaffolding/to build a framework/to launch an enterprise
